alert.note: Alert for Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 29 at 6:30PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Florida... St. Marks River near Newport On Old Magnolia Rd affecting Leon and Wakulla Counties. For the St. Marks River...including Newport On Old Magnolia Rd... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St. Marks River near Newport On Old Magnolia Rd. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding increases around homes on the east side of Old Magnolia Road in Wakulla County. Access to some of these homes may be restricted above this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 0.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.8 feet Thursday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.0 feet on 09/18/1957. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 1230 PM EDT.
